Hey Guys!

I would like to invite you to take part in an exciting new concept to kerbal space program

 

KERBOT WARS!!

I am looking for talented builder\drivers to take part in a tournament fighting each other on a DMP server using battle ready robots

We will be fighting at 19:00 UTC SAT 13 AUG on a private DMP server, so build accordingly.. lag time and glitches are very much going to be a part of these fights

The mod list that we'll be using is in the video description, but you'll only have access to stock and infernal robotics bits, of which you can only use 50 parts with a 10 ton weight limit.. which you should be hard pressed to hit

Your robot will be the one registering for combat, so I'll need a short video from you about your bot.. no concepts, I wanna see a completed robot, Voice Over not needed..
but some notes about what you think is good and bad about the design would be useful for production..

Any more details needed can be found in the attached video, good luck and build dangerous

Edited August 4, 2016 by Twitchi
